channel.title: CVE Feed for Rocket.Chat -- Mobile
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rocket.Chat -- Mobile

item.title: CVE-2024-42027|2024-10-07T12:46:16.115Z -- rocket.chat -- mobile
item.description: The E2EE password entropy generated by Rocket.Chat Mobile prior to version 4.5.1 is insufficient, allowing attackers to crack it if they have the appropriate time and resources.
